about.description:
I´m a passionate front-end developer with experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, TailwindCSS, Next.js, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Git, Github, HTML, CSS. I live in the state of Guanajuato in Mexico, I have a degree in Information Technology Engineering.

I specialize in JavaScript, React and TailwindCSS to create beautiful user experiences. I love solving problems and facing new challenges. I am proactive, persevering, adaptable, with ease in collaborating as a team. I love football, video games and technology.

+8 years of experience working as a maintenance technician, network management, management of ERP Mapics, creation of users with Active Directory, internal mail management with Lotus Notes, preventive and corrective maintenance of computer equipment and printers.
about.descriptionexperience1: Currently learning Astro and Angular doing projects and improving my english conversation.
about.descriptionexperience2: Finished real estate project learning new libraries like Leaflet or Framer Motion.
about.descriptionexperience3: Improving and updating content and responsive design of the Valle de Santiago page.
about.descriptionexperience4: Finished more than 10 challenges from Frontend Mentor page learning new technologies like Tailwind or Next.js.
about.descriptionexperience5: Practicing and learning TypeScript and PostgreSQL creating various projects.
about.descriptionexperience6: Finished e-commerce project learning new technologies such as Clerk, MySQL and Stripe, creating an administrator panel to manage sales.
about.descriptionexperience7: Freelance work at Henry, carrying out several full-stack projects individually and as a team.
about.descriptionexperience8: Finished blog project, learning techs like Auth0 and Express, focused on news about my favorite team, FC Barcelona.
about.descriptionexperience9: Practicing and learning JavaScript, React, Redux and Node.js creating various projects.
about.descriptionexperience10: Creation of an internal page in PHP to manage the database of beneficiaries of a government program.
about.descriptionexperience11: I got my first job, in the government as a technician, performing hardware and software maintenance on PCs and printers.

projects.project1Description: FC Barcelona news, has user authentication, CRUD of comments, saving information in database, filtering, conditional rendering.
projects.project2Description: Shorten the link you want and copy it to the clipboard with a single click, the links are saved in the local storage, information consumed from an API.
projects.project3Description: You can search, filter, modify, delete and create pokemon, which are consumed through an external API and, in turn, are stored in a database.
projects.project4Description: Clothing sale, has user authentication, payment gateway, combined filters, search by name, local storage, dashboard admin, reviews.
projects.project5Description: You can book an appointment at the clinic you receive a notification by email, it has dark/light mode and is adaptable to cell phones.
projects.project6Description: Rent a car quick and easy, has search by make or model, conditional rendering, car details, responsive design.
projects.project7Description: Discover the number of years, months and days that have passed since any date, it has validations for leap years, months with less than 31 days.
projects.project8Description: Play this classic game against a person or against the computer, it has local storage to save the current game when reloading the page.
projects.project9Description: Page created more than 25 years ago by my father, I have updated several sections of the website, which consists of making known the beautiful city where we live.
projects.project10Description: Landing page to show the benefits of a bank, features responsive design, Frontend Mentor page challenge.
projects.project11Description: Rent or sell properties, you can filter to find a house or apartment in various states of Mexico, you can also find them from an interactive map.
projects.project12Description: Create a space to manage sales, products, categories of your online store, you can also have more than one, it has protected routes.
projects.project13Description: E-commerce food sale, has payment gateway by stripe, filters, search, carrousel, local storage, dashboard admin.
projects.project14Description: This website offers simplicity and clean design, prioritizes user experience, join us to fit easily and completely your body, do you accept the challenge?
projects.project15Description: Consult countries from all around the world, you can search, filter, and find more than 250 countries. Information consumed from an API.
